code: @Override protected Object invokeUnderTrace(MethodInvocation invocation, Log logger) throws Throwable {     String name = createInvocationTraceName(invocation).     StopWatch stopWatch = new StopWatch(name).     stopWatch.start(name).     try {         return invocation.proceed().     } finally {         stopWatch.stop().         writeToLog(logger, stopWatch.shortSummary()).     } }
